scripts.cap:build: npm run build-static && npx cap copy
scripts.cap:build:prod: npm run build-static:prod && npx cap copy
scripts.cap:sync: npm run build-static && npx cap sync
scripts.cap:sync:prod: npm run build-static:prod && npx cap sync
scripts.cap:run:ios: npm run cap:sync && npx cap run ios
scripts.cap:run:ios:prod: npm run cap:sync:prod && npx cap run ios
scripts.cap:run:ios:debug: npm run cap:sync && npx cap run ios --livereload --external
scripts.ios:build: npm run cap:sync && npx cap build ios
scripts.ios:build:prod: npm run cap:sync:prod && npx cap build ios
scripts.ios:debug: npm run cap:sync && npx cap run ios --livereload --external --consolelogs
scripts.debug:ios: npm run cap:sync && npx cap run ios --livereload --external --consolelogs --verbose
